OSGi Bundle Versioning Service (OBVS)
post.extended: Submit the JAR files of a base bundle and its sequel(s). The service will return for download the sequel bundle(s) with versioning headers in the MANIFEST file set correctly with respect to the semantics of changes between the sequel bundle and either the base bundle or its predecessor in the sequence. Only bundles with the same (prevailing) Bundle-SymbolicName will be versioned.
